keyEvents.description: Ace and Luffy fight through Marine forces across Marineford as they attempt to escape.
keyEvents.significance: The battlefield becomes a proving ground for the brothers' coordinated combat abilities.

keyEvents.description: Admiral Aokiji confronts Ace and Luffy, launching a massive ice attack across the plaza.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the scale of Admiral-level combat and the destruction it causes to the environment.

keyEvents.description: Squard attempts to ram his ship into Marineford's defenses to create a diversion.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the physical fortifications of Marineford and the pirates' desperation to escape.

keyEvents.description: Whitebeard delivers his final captain's order at Marineford, choosing to stay behind while his crew escapes.
keyEvents.significance: Marineford becomes the site of Whitebeard's last stand and his legacy-defining moment.

description: Marine Headquarters, the center of Marine power in the One Piece world. Currently the battlefield for the Summit War between the Marines and Whitebeard Pirates.
culturalSignificance: Marineford represents the strength and authority of the World Government. The war taking place here symbolizes the clash between the old era of pirates (Whitebeard) and the established world order.
